description: Monitor M365 Audit logs for the Operations Add app role assignment grant to user and/or Consent to application occurring against AzureActiveDirectory Workloads. Analytic 1 - Unusual app role assignments or consents to applications. index=security sourcetype="WinEventLog:Security" EventCode=5136 OR (index=azuread sourcetype="azure:activity" operationName="Add member to role" OR operationName="Update application" OR operationName="Update servicePrincipal") OR (index=gsuite sourcetype="gsuite:admin" event_type="UPDATE_GROUP" OR event_type="UPDATE_USER") OR (index=o365 sourcetype="o365:management:activity" operation IN ("Add member to role", "Update user", "Update group"))
